0.query:
fetch dt.entity.host
| fields entity.name, id, hosts, hypervisorType,osType, cloudType=if(isNotNull(cloudType),cloudType,else:"N/A"), cpuCores, physicalMemory
| filter isNotNull(entity.name)
| lookup [timeseries avgMem=avg(dt.host.memory.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:5d
| fieldsAdd MemoryUsage=arrayFirst(avgMem)], lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"mem:"
| lookup [timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:5d
| fieldsAdd CPUUsage=arrayFirst(avgCpu)], lookupField:dt.entity.host, sourceField:id, prefix:"cpu:"
| fields host=entity.name, os=osType,CPU=cpuCores, Mem=(toDouble(physicalMemory) / 1000000000), MemoryUsage=`mem:MemoryUsage`, CPUUsage=`cpu:CPUUsage`,CloudType=cloudType
| filter in(host, $HostName)
| filter in (CloudType,$CloudType)
| sort CloudType asc 
| limit 100
| sort MemoryUsage desc
